name: Pixel bomb! bomb!!
description: Long time ago, there was a beautiful Queen in Leroy Forest. The Queen was very narcissistic. She dressed up splendid every day and thought she was the fairest woman in the Forest. Every beautiful girl in the kingdom would lose good looks by the Queen's curse.
minimum_requirements: OS: win7+ Processor: Intel i7-4970 Memory: 4048 MB RAM Graphics: GTX970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: win7+ Processor: Intel i7-6700 Memory: 8096 MB RAM Graphics: GTX970+ DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
